overview_summary: None of the five profiled neighbors have a documented stance on development or clean energy, as no public statements or actions could be found. Most exhibit low community profiles, with only one (a retired school administrator) suggesting moderate local influence. No high-influence community figures were identified in this group.

neighbors.name: Brian Brake
neighbors.claims: Brian Brake is listed as an owner of a Roxana parcel but has no evident public profile or civic roles ([www.thetelegraph.com](https://www.thetelegraph.com/news/article/Brake-12690810.php#:~:text=News%20,Curtis%20Martin%20officiated)). No references to him in local news or government records were found, suggesting he is a private resident with no noted public stance ([www.thetelegraph.com](https://www.thetelegraph.com/news/article/Brake-12690810.php#:~:text=News%20,Curtis%20Martin%20officiated)).

approach_recommendations.engage: Approach with a friendly, informal introduction to learn his views, as he has no known stance or affiliations.

neighbors.name: Edward Bazzell
neighbors.claims: Edward Bazzell appears to be a private landowner with no mentions in local media or civic records ([metroeastsun.com](https://metroeastsun.com/stories/650706048-recent-madison-county-home-sales-in-week-ending-june-10#:~:text=Buyer%3A%20Ethan%20C,Bazzell%20Seller%3A%20Suzanne%20Johnes)). His surname is present in the area (e.g., other Bazzell family real estate activity) but no public activities or statements by Edward were found ([metroeastsun.com](https://metroeastsun.com/stories/650706048-recent-madison-county-home-sales-in-week-ending-june-10#:~:text=Buyer%3A%20Ethan%20C,Bazzell%20Seller%3A%20Suzanne%20Johnes)).

approach_recommendations.engage: Engage one-on-one through a casual conversation by a community liaison, focusing on listening to any concerns since he’s not publicly outspoken.

neighbors.name: Rue Foe
neighbors.claims: Rue Foe had a career in local education, noted as an assistant principal in a high school during the 1970s ([www.newspapers.com](https://www.newspapers.com/newspage/26507563/#:~:text=The%20board%20also%20voted%20to,day)). No recent public statements or community positions by Foe on development or energy issues could be identified in available records ([royaldutchshellplc.com](https://royaldutchshellplc.com/2011/06/09/roxana-residents-assail-shell-over-benzene-worries/?nb=1&share=print#:~:text=residents%20who%20wanted%20to%20hire,his%20firm%20in%20the%20matter)).

approach_recommendations.engage: Highlight educational and community benefits when reaching out. A respected former educator may respond well to outreach that references local schools or youth.

neighbors.name: Robert D. Farris
neighbors.claims: Robert D. Farris of Roxana was involved in a 2014 incident in which his wife Sandra was tragically killed in a vehicle accident ([www.thetelegraph.com](https://www.thetelegraph.com/news/article/Roxana-woman-killed-in-La-crash-12647913.php#:~:text=David%20says%20the%20accident%20occurred,that%20held%20two%20large%20propellers)). Aside from this personal event, Farris has not been noted in public local affairs or taken any visible stance on development issues ([royaldutchshellplc.com](https://royaldutchshellplc.com/2011/06/09/roxana-residents-assail-shell-over-benzene-worries/?nb=1&share=print#:~:text=residents%20who%20wanted%20to%20hire,his%20firm%20in%20the%20matter)).

approach_recommendations.engage: Use a considerate, empathetic approach via a personal visit or call. Emphasize listening to his priorities, as he has remained privately in the community without public positions.

neighbors.name: Robin E. Staggs and Matthew E. Staggs
neighbors.claims: Robin E. and Matthew E. Staggs are co-owners of a residential parcel in Roxana, and no record of any public roles or statements by them was found ([metroeastsun.com](https://metroeastsun.com/stories/650706048-recent-madison-county-home-sales-in-week-ending-june-10#:~:text=514%20Logan%20St.%2015%20,Maricela%20Williams%20Seller%3A%20Rachel%20Staggs)). The Staggs name appears in area property transactions (e.g., a recent sale by a different Staggs), but this couple has no evident public profile ([metroeastsun.com](https://metroeastsun.com/stories/650706048-recent-madison-county-home-sales-in-week-ending-june-10#:~:text=514%20Logan%20St.%2015%20,Maricela%20Williams%20Seller%3A%20Rachel%20Staggs)).

approach_recommendations.engage: Reach out as neighbors through a community open house or informal meeting. With no known activism, focus on building rapport and understanding their general concerns.
